name: SpotOnQuotes
0:
”Alexa, ask sporty quotes to give me a quote”
”tell me a sports quote”
”provide me a quote”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sporty quotes
des:
This skill provides you a motivational quotes from famous people and sports players. You can ask to Alexa to tell a sports quote. Get inspired. 

About the author:
I am a 8 yr old developed this skill with of bit of guidance from my dad to motivate me and others kids. I am working on improving this skills. Help me to improve this skill by providing me your suggestions & feedback and any quote you feel appropriate.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
